oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mitigating Aflatoxin in Rwanda
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Herrman, Timothy J
Hoffmann, Vivian
Kamaraba, Illuminee
Konlambigue, Matieyedou
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Aflatoxin, Rwanda, mitigation strategies, APTECA
Aflatoxin Risk Management
Rwanda
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: On August 18th, 2021, the International Growth Centre and the Rwandan Ministry of Agriculture organised a webinar under the theme Market Driven Strategies for Mitigating Aflatoxin in Rwanda. The webinar highlighted Rwanda's progress towards mitigating aflatoxin and showcased innovative approaches used by neighbouring countries. The event was an opportunity for stakeholders to discuss Rwandaâ€™s key challenges in post-harvest management and assess the evidence on approaches that have (not) worked in similar contexts. https://doi.org/10.21423/jrs-v09i2kamaraba
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Office of the Texas State Chemist
